articles.description: Woods and McIlroy have been two of the PGA Tour's biggest supporters amid the battle against LIV Golf and the duo have taken it upon themselves to contribute to the fightback.
articles.content:
Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy have teamed up to spearhead a new PGA Tour 'stadium' competition, according to reports.  
Woods and McIlroy have been two of the PGA Tour's biggest supporters amid golf'… [+5275 chars]
